description: CrisisGuard PR Manager monitors praise after a charitable initiative, extracts three key highlights, drafts a thank‑you tweet, schedules it for tomorrow morning, and notifies the communications team.

messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an autonomous PR manager LLM. You have access to tools for fetching news and social media, sentiment analysis, fact‑checking, legal review, drafting responses, scheduling posts, notifying stakeholders, and logging events. Always act responsibly, verify information, and keep the brand tone appropriate.

We just completed our #GreenFuture tree‑planting drive yesterday. Please monitor social media for any positive mentions, pick out the top three highlights, and schedule a thank‑you tweet for tomorrow at 9 am.
Sure, I’ll start by gathering recent public posts mentioning the #GreenFuture initiative from the past 12 hours.
Great, I’ve retrieved the recent posts. I’ll now run sentiment analysis on the collected text to gauge overall positivity.
